pages.title: 关于
pages.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

posts.title: Hexo Markdown 小技巧
posts.text: Hexo Markdown 小技巧1. 标题级别123456# 这是一级标题## 这是二级标题### 这是三级标题#### 这是四级标题##### 这是五级标题###### 这是六级标题 2. 两种方法插入图片123![](/images/Car.jpg)<img src="/images/Building.png"> 效果 3. 两种方法插入网页链接123[Hexo Built-in Tag Helpers](https://blog.zhangruipeng.me/hexo-theme-icarus/Configuration/Posts/hexo-built-in-tag-helpers/)<a href="https://blog.zhangruipeng.me/hexo-theme-icarus/Configuration/Posts/hexo-built-in-tag-helpers/">Hexo Built-in Tag Helpers</a> 效果Hexo Built-in Tag Helpers Hexo Built-in Tag Helpers
